arts.ttl: Bove agent: “He wanted to become a club Icon, but Souloukou pushed for his transfer.”
arts.sum: Edoardo Bove’s agent, Diego Tavano, has provided an update on the player’s health and reflected on his career moves in a recent interview with Corriere dello Sport. Following a major health scare and subsequent medical intervention, Bove is slowly returning to normalcy, though currently without football training. Tavano, who considers Bove family, expressed his relief about the player’s condition: “The most important thing is that he’s doing well. For me, the football aspect isn’t as crucial as the rest: because thanks to him, I’m a better man today.” Regarding Bove’s recovery, Tavano stated, “Edoardo won’t give up an inch. arts.ttl: Serie A | Roma 5-0 Parma: Match Report
arts.sum: Roma secured a resounding 5-0 victory over Parma at the Stadio Olimpico, showcasing their offensive prowess and defensive solidity. Paulo Dybala led the charge with two goals, while Alexis Saelemaekers and Artem Dovbyk also found the back of the net, with Leandro Paredes adding a penalty.
